ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Great thanks for that! I ve been reading up on Shadow knight sites and there is so much arguing about how tough certain creatures are it s unbelievable.
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:55 AM 6/29/00 -0400, you wrote:
Hehe.   D.O.T. = Damage over Time.  These refer to your Darkness line of spells.....Clinging Darkness, Engulfing Darkness (etc) and your poison/disease spells.

Use 'em and abuse 'em.  They'll make you a better SK.

---------

Great thanks for that!

I've been reading up on Shadow knight sites and there is so much arguing about how tough certain creatures are it's unbelievable.

eg.  Dervish Cutthroat - I can take three on at level-10

answer - my arse can you take them on at level-10 you'de need to have around three at level 10 to take on one!

Anyway it went on like that for 6 pages.

I've recently just entered South Ro and found killing the Ork warriors not to hard.  There where two off us : Me Troll Shadow, Lev-9  and the guy I was with a Troll Shaman Lev-9 as well.  Between us we could take out a camp of three warriors and a Cleric, but we targeted the cleric first since the git kept healing the warriors every time we hit them!!!

I'm finding it easy to kill creatures but after say an hour of hacking I look at my exp and see basically no difference, is the generally what happens when your a Troll and a Shadow Knight!!!!!


James
